#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
inline int inp()
{
    int noRead=0;
    char p= getchar_unlocked();
    for(;p<33;)
    {
     p=getchar_unlocked();
    };
    while(p>32)
    {
     noRead = (noRead << 3) + (noRead << 1) + (p - '0');
     p=getchar_unlocked();
    }
    return noRead;
};
int main()
{
	int t,n,a,i;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		//scanf("%d",&n);
		n=inp();
		if(n%2!=0)
		{
			printf("0\n");
		}
		else
		{
			printf("9");
			a=n/2;
			for(i=1;i<=a-1;i++)
			printf("0");
			printf("\n");
		}
	}
}
